page.title: 10RIVER ***** MY HOME ****
page.content: {Woolgars}was built in the sixteenth century.It was probably the home of a{ {yeoman farmer} called {Woolgar.} Originally the cottage would have had a{smoke bay}but a brick chimney with a bread oven was built in the seventeenth century. Also at this time an{outhouse}containing the stairs was built on to provide easier access to the upper two rooms.These stairs replaced a{ladder}leading up to a hole in the ceiling.During the late twentieth century the lean_to rooms on either end of the cottage were knocked down and new extensions were built on. My parents kindly allowed some of my friends to visit the house. We made a film and showed the rest of my class the unusual parts of the house. Written and typed by {Shona Buchanan }of{Woolgars.
